# gifalyzer

Small tool to debug animated GIFs.


## Usage

    $ pip install gifalyzer
    $ gifalyzer <path-to-gif>
    dimensions         : (360, 640)
    filesize           : 151459
    frame_count        : 50
    frame_delay_ms     : 100
    frame_frequency    : 10
    gif_version        : GIF89a
    humanized_filesize : 147.9kB
    last_frame_delay_ms: 3000
    total_duration_ms  : 8000
